00038 namespace Ogre {
00039 
00040 
00049     class _OgreExport MovablePlane : public Plane, public MovableObject
00050     {
00051     protected:
00052         mutable Plane mDerivedPlane;
00053         mutable Vector3 mLastTranslate;
00054         mutable Quaternion mLastRotate;
00055         AxisAlignedBox mNullBB;
00056         mutable bool mDirty;
00057         static String msMovableType;
00058     public:
00059 
00060         MovablePlane(const String& name);
00061         MovablePlane (const Plane& rhs);
00063         MovablePlane (const Vector3& rkNormal, Real fConstant);
00064         MovablePlane (const Vector3& rkNormal, const Vector3& rkPoint);
00065         MovablePlane (const Vector3& rkPoint0, const Vector3& rkPoint1,
00066             const Vector3& rkPoint2);
00067         ~MovablePlane() {}
00069         void _notifyCurrentCamera(Camera* cam) { /* don't care */ }
00071         const AxisAlignedBox& getBoundingBox(void) const { return mNullBB; }
00073         Real getBoundingRadius(void) const { return Math::POS_INFINITY; }
00075         void _updateRenderQueue(RenderQueue* queue) { /* do nothing */}
00077         const String& getMovableType(void) const;
00079         const Plane& _getDerivedPlane(void) const;
00080 
00081     };
00082 }
